I Have Experience In

Multiple Programming Languages

Built simple/complex projects using: C, C#, C++, Java, and JavaScript. Took numerous college and online courses for those languages. Spent most of my time learning JavaScript on a deeper level.

UI/UX

Designed and built user interfaces from scratch. Websites are responsive and look great on mobile devices. Proficient with CSS Grid and Flexbox. Used inspiration from modern websites to present information in an attractive way.

Frontend Technology

Used technologies such as React to build single page frontend applications. These applications used asynchronous programming to communicate with outside APIs. Also used Sass to improve and expand the CSS in my projects.

Backend Development

Built my own API that facilitated communication between frontend and backend components. Used Node and the express module to handle HTTP requests. Stored and provided data using the Knex module and a PostgreSQL database.

My Career Goals

Programming is not just about writing applications. It is about creating experiences and tools that enrich the lives of the people that use them. That is my mission.

1

Get a Job as a Software Developer

Establish a foothold in the development industry and grow my skillset in a team based environment.

2

Learn Fullstack Development

Expand my knowledge on building frontend and backend applications using all of the latest technologies and practices.

3

Build Amazing Applications

Acquire the ability to build scalable and robust projects that are easy to maintain. Be able to transform any programming idea into reality. Add value to the lives of the people that use my applications.
